attributes.action: Against pornography censoring in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is dedicated to those who want to remove the ban on the following sex-acts being portrayed in pornography in the UK:

Spanking
Caning
Aggressive whipping
Penetration by any object "associated with violence"
Physical or verbal abuse (regardless of  if consensual)
Urolagnia (known as "water sports")
Female ejaculation
Strangulation (given due care)
Facesitting
Fisting

As long as care is taken and the participants are of legal age and consent, these acts should be allowed
